title: The Untold Story: My 20 Years Running the National Enquirer
description: The former editor-in-chief of the National Enquirer presents a candid account of his twenty-year career with America's most notorious tabloid, offering behind-the-scenes glimpses of the stories behind some of the paper's most famous headlines, cover photos, and articles and revealing the truth about a host of celebrity icons and their lives. 25,000 first printing.
author: Lain Calder
